definition: to raise the same topic
heavy/serious/to attach importance to
to repeat/repetition/again/re-/classifier: layer
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to raise the same old topic again/to hark back

sentences.english: "Emotion and molding" was very similar to the old topic of emotion and art.
sentences.chinese: “情感与造型”，似是重提了情感与艺术的老话题。

sentences.english: This harks back to something I mentioned in my first tip.
sentences.chinese: 这又重提了我在第一点里说到的。

sentences.english: Now, the most tenuous of news reports has ramped the talk up again.
sentences.chinese: 目前这则最飘渺的新闻报道再一次被重提。

sentences.english: Heidegger revealed the necessity for explicitly restating the question of Being.
sentences.chinese: 海德格的诠释现象学揭露了重提存有问题的必要性。

sentences.english: The proposed repeat of the corporate tax repatriation holiday is one such wolf in sheep's clothing.
sentences.chinese: 重提回流资金减税就是这种批着羊皮的狼。
他们旧事重提，揭开了旧的伤痕。

sentences.english: However, we can wait for better again this matter.
sentences.chinese: 然而一等情况好转，我们自当重提此事。

sentences.english: She dare not mention the subject again.
Then, all of a sudden, some people insisted on bringing the subject up again.
sentences.chinese: 然后，突然之间，一些人又坚持重提旧事。

sentences.english: We are seeing signs of success, which I will turn to later.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在看到成功的迹象，我稍后将重提这个问题。

sentences.english: Scotland shelved its proposals for a charge, but they could yet be revived.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰搁置了收费的提议，但仍有可能被重提。

sentences.english: You're always harking back to how things were50 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 你老是喜欢重提五十年前的境况。

sentences.english: For as the sun is daily new and old, So ism love still telling what is told.
sentences.chinese: 太阳每天有新久的交替，我的爱也就永远把旧话重提。

sentences.english: It was right there in front of you. Why do you want to talk about that again?
sentences.chinese: 自由就在你眼前，你为何不愿再旧事重提？

sentences.english: Don't beat the dead horse. We cleared up that misunderstanding long ago.
sentences.chinese: 不要在重提旧事，很久之前我们就澄清那误会了。

sentences.english: Bringing up a matter of the past, only in order to promote today's introspection.
sentences.chinese: 旧事重提，只为促进今天的反省。

definition: to raise the same old topic again/to hark back
to play the same old tune (idiom); unoriginal
old affair/former matter
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to bring to sb's attention
to use the current topic to put over one's own ideas/to use sth as a pretext to make a fuss
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
words still ringing in one's ears (idiom)
not to mention (idiom); to say not one word/fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
The issue is in the past, and the situation has changed (idiom)./It is water under the bridge.
to turn over old accounts/fig. to revive old quarrels/to reopen old wounds
to refuse to say anything about (idiom)/to remain tight-lipped/to avoid mentioning
to reaffirm/to reiterate
lit. old account/old debt/fig. old scores to settle/old quarrels/old grudge
old anecdote/stories passed on from former times
repeatedly
an old observation (idiom)/a truism/banal comments
